whatIsTeacherHub.question: What is Teacher Hub?
whatIsTeacherHub.answer: Teacher Hub is a comprehensive platform designed specifically for Ugandan teachers to collaborate, share educational resources, and access official government content. It provides tools for professional development, community building, and resource management.

howToRegister.question: How do I register as a teacher?
howToRegister.answer: To register, click 'Get Started' or 'Register' and provide your teaching credentials, including your teaching certificate or employment letter. We verify all teacher credentials to ensure platform authenticity.

credentialVerification.question: How long does credential verification take?
credentialVerification.answer: Credential verification typically takes 2-3 business days. You'll receive an email notification once your credentials are verified and your account is fully activated.

forgotPassword.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
forgotPassword.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password.

updateProfile.question: How do I update my profile information?
updateProfile.answer: Go to your Profile page and click 'Edit Profile'. You can update your personal information, teaching subjects, grade levels, and school details. Remember to save your changes.

privacySettings.question: How do I manage my privacy settings?
privacySettings.answer: In your Profile settings, you can control who can see your profile information, contact you, and view your shared resources. You can also manage notification preferences.

uploadResources.question: How do I upload and share resources?
uploadResources.answer: Go to the Resources section and click 'Upload Resource'. Select your file, add a title and description, choose appropriate tags and categories, then publish. Other teachers can then discover and download your resources.

downloadOffline.question: Can I download resources for offline use?
downloadOffline.answer: Yes! Click the download button on any resource to save it to your device. Downloaded resources are available in your 'Downloaded Resources' section and can be accessed without internet connection.

governmentContent.question: How do I access government content?
governmentContent.answer: Government content from Ministry of Education, UNEB, and NCDC is automatically available in the Resources section with official verification badges. You can filter specifically for government content using the content filters.

joinCommunities.question: How do I join teacher communities?
joinCommunities.answer: Browse communities in the Communities section. You can join subject-specific, regional, or grade-level communities. Click 'Join Community' to participate in discussions and collaborate with other teachers.

createCommunity.question: Can I create my own community?
createCommunity.answer: Yes! Click 'Create Community' in the Communities section. Choose a community type, add a description and rules, then invite other teachers to join your community.

offlineAccess.question: How does offline access work?
offlineAccess.answer: Download resources and enable offline mode in your settings. The app will sync your changes when you're back online. You can access downloaded content, draft messages, and continue working without internet.

syncIssues.question: I'm having sync issues. What should I do?
syncIssues.answer: Check your internet connection and try refreshing the app. If issues persist, go to Settings > Sync and manually trigger a sync. Contact support if problems continue.

mobileApp.question: Is there a mobile app available?
mobileApp.answer: Teacher Hub works as a Progressive Web App (PWA) on mobile devices. You can install it on your phone by visiting the website and selecting 'Add to Home Screen' when prompted.

installPWA.question: How do I install Teacher Hub on my phone?
installPWA.answer: Visit teacherhub.ug on your mobile browser. You'll see an 'Install App' prompt. Tap 'Install' to add Teacher Hub to your home screen for easy access.
